title: Why can't I invite?
body: There's someone who's only one rank away from me, but I can't invite them, and I'm not even high elo yet. Wtf????

replies.body:
If you and the player you're trying to invite have a large gap in MMR between each other, you'll be unable to invite them to duo with you in ranked queues. This hidden MMR is calculated based on your previous season's MMR and your preseason matches. Additionally, even in your placement matches, the same normal [ranked tier restrictions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204010760-Ranked-Play-FAQ#h4) are in place.

Let me know if you have any other questions.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=0KBqXK8W,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-12-12T02:40:40.003+0000)
>
> If you and the player you're trying to invite have a large gap in MMR between each other, you'll be unable to invite them to duo with you in ranked queues. This hidden MMR is calculated based on your previous season's MMR and your preseason matches. Additionally, even in your placement matches, the same normal [ranked tier restrictions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204010760-Ranked-Play-FAQ#h4) are in place.
> 
> Let me know if you have any other questions.

But if my mmr is that high, why would it place me in such a low elo in the first place? That makes 0 sense, why would it place me that low just to give me like 26lp per win anyway and waste my time? It's like the system has already admitted that it knows I should be placed higher.
